version_description:
• Fixed crash when opening Privacy Policy and Terms of Use (sorry about that, brysonholland!)
• Compose button won’t cover content anymore with open calendar (cheers, Limeshark47!)
• Small fixes here and there

We hope you are enjoying the Five Minute Journal. We would be grateful if you could take a minute to review the app and let us know what you think. It really does help. Thank You!

• 3D Touch shortcuts – Quickly add new entries from your homescreen!
• Fixed repeating Weekly Challenges
• General bugfixes and improvements

We hope you are enjoying the Five Minute Journal. We would be grateful if you could take a minute to review the app and let us know what you think. It really does help. Thank You!

• Fixed TouchID authentication issues
• Bugfixes and improvements

We hope you are enjoying the Five Minute Journal. We would be grateful if you could take a minute to review the app and let us know what you think. It really does help. Thank You!

• iOS10 Compatible.
• Timezone issues should be now resolved. If in very rare case app crashes for you, please reinstall the app and it should be fixed for good.
• Subscribe or unsubscribe to Newsletter conveniently in Account screen.
• It's now possible to delete your account from Account screen.
• Improved Timeline to allow even faster scrolling.
• Nicer Compose menu animation.
• More reliable image uploads.
• Various tweaks, fixes and house cleaning.

We hope you are enjoying the Five Minute Journal. We would be grateful if you could take a minute to review the app and let us know what you think. It really does help. Thank You!

• Your Five Minute Journal photos will now be saved to camera roll - you can switch this option on or off under account preferences
• Minor fixes
Stability improvements to export and reminders

• Your Five Minute Journal entries will now auto-save as you go. If you exit the app before you're quite finished, your unfinished entry will be waiting for you when you return!
• A small bug with editing entries featuring an image has now been resolved.
• The terms of service button wasn't working for some iOS 10 users due to some system changes. This is now fixed!
• Some general updates and improvements behind the scenes to keep you smiling.

• Small bug with passcode keyboard is now fixed
• Other minor bug fixes and improvements behind the scenes
• Other minor bug fixes and improvements behind the scenes

IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES:
• We’re now fully optimised for iOS11 and the iPhone X! 
• Increased stability and bug fixes

IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES:
• We’re now fully optimised for iOS11 and the iPhone X! 
• Increased stability and bug fixes

IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES:
• We’re now fully optimised for iOS11 and the iPhone X! 
• Increased stability and bug fixes

IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES:
• We’re now fully optimised for iOS11 and the iPhone X! 
• Increased stability and bug fixes

IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES
• We had an issue where some large exports of your journal were missing images, this should now be fixed!

UPDATES & FIXES
• New better control over syncing. Five Minute Journal syncs all your entries automatically, but when it can’t, it will let you know and you can trigger sync manually.
• You pointed out a typo in quotes. We've corrected it.

UPDATES & FIXES
• We had a bug that stopped new users signing in. Very sorry about that, the fix was issued as quickly as we could!

• New better control over syncing. Five Minute Journal syncs all your entries automatically, but when it can’t, it will let you know and you can trigger sync manually.
• You pointed out a typo in quotes. We've corrected it.

UPDATES & FIXES
• You can now share the Five Minute Journal app with friends from the settings screen
• General bugfixes and stability improvements
Brand new search functionality! Search all your entries using the new search bar.

NEW FIX
- Crashing issue for some users when syncing entries between devices has now been fixed

NEW
- Full support for all the iPads!
- Support for all the iPhones (including XS Max and XR)
- New intro animation (more suitable for all the new screen sizes)
- Reworked syncing mechanism – no need to manually confirm Entry saving
- Calendar now visually indicates days with entries

IMPROVEMENTS
- Reworked Editor layouting, now works great with large iPads
- Expanded image fits picture perfectly in the available area
- Improved typography to better match iOS12 style
- Month headers now use background blur
- Adding a new image via Add Menu now highlights photo controls instead of opening another menu
- Date selection now happens in Add Menu
- Entries table has extra bottom space which stops the Add Button overlapping the last record
- Calendar no longer shows placeholder days (days not present in currently shown month)
- Many other small UI refinements and tweaks

FIXES
- Fixed image synchronization in some cases
- Fixed crash that could occur when deleting entry
- Fixed issue that could cause empty Weekly Challenge

UPDATES & FIXES
• Fixed a crash issue some users experienced when using search
• Issue with data/entries sometimes not fully loading now fixed
• General bugfixes and maintenance

- A new alert to let you know when you're offline (sync will resume once you reconnect).
- Some users may have experienced an issue with Facebook login, this is now fixed!
- Finish editing your journal entries conveniently using the new 'Done' button.

FIXES & UPDATES
• General maintenance and improvements

UPDATES & FIXES
• Full iOS 13 support
• The app now supports Sign in with Apple

UPDATES & FIXES
• Improvements to syncing mechanism
• General maintenance and updates

UPDATES & FIXES
• You can now add Apple Sign-in to an existing account!
• General maintenance and stability improvements.

UPDATES & FIXES
• Issue with keyboards obscuring the app rating option is now fixed
• General stability improvements

UPDATES & FIXES
• Updated iOS 14 compatibility
• General updates & improvements

UPDATES & FIXES
• Updated iOS 14 compatibility
• General updates & improvements

UPDATES & FIXES
• Updated iOS 14 compatibility
